name: Symmetricom
overview: Symmetricom, Inc. generates, distributes and applies precise time for the communications, aerospace/defense, information technology (IT) infrastructure and metrology industries. The Companyâ€™s customers, from communications service providers and network equipment manufacturers to governments and their suppliers worldwide, are able to build more networks and systems by using its advanced timing technologies, synchronization systems, atomic clocks, services and solutions. Its products support precise timing standards, including global positioning system (GPS)-based timing, IEEE 1588 (PTP), Network Time Protocol (NTP), Synchronous Ethernet Building Integrated Timing Supply (BITS) and Data Over Cable Service Interface Specifications (DOCSIS(R)) timing. Symmetricom is organized into two segments: Communications business unit and the Government business unit. In March 2010, the Company completed the sale of its video Quality of Experience (QoE) business to Cheetah Technologies, L.P.

milestones.description: Symmetricom Announces Agreement to Acquire Assets of Brilliant Telecommunications, Inc.
milestones.source_description: Symmetricom Announces Agreement to Acquire Assets of Brilliant Telecommunications, Inc.
